entry.title: Wondering Why
entry.summary:
Author: IrishMum1710

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 469Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: Sometimes love doesn’t make sense on paper — one man built on faith, the other on fire and questions — but somehow it works. Eddie’s steadiness. Buck’s wonder. Two halves of a quiet miracle, stitched together by everyday grace. Inspired by “Wondering Why” by The Red Clay Strays.

entry.title: Sleeping Arrangements
entry.summary:
Author: buckmeetsboy

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,298Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 29

Summary: Eddie stares at him — hair a mess, eyes shadowed, that faint line between his brows that only shows up when he’s worried about everyone but himself. He exhales. “Just—take the bed, Buck. Please.” Buck shakes his head. “No.” Eddie groans, running a hand down his face. “You’re sleeping on the damn bed.” Buck folds his arms, smug. “Make me.” Eddie blinks. “Did you just—” “Yeah.” Buck’s smile widens, equal parts challenge and mischief. “Make me.”   Or Buck and Eddie can't decide on who gets the bed so they do something about it.

entry.title: If I Could Turn Buck Time, I Would Buck the Timeline Up
entry.summary:
Author: The_Bees_Want_Arson

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,209Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 28

Summary: He remembered staring up at the weird blue clouds, rain dripping past the visor of his helmet and an apartment fire roaring in the background. He remembered watching the microsecond it took for lightning to arch towards him and then he remembers nothing. Nothing, Nada, Nil. There was the briefest minute of pain, so fast that he could barely even register it and the sensation of being yanked by his harness but then it had all gone white. None of that explained why he was looking at the stained popcorn ceiling of the room he had had when he was sharing a house with four other dudes. He recognized the stain in the corner of the room, there used to be a leak there that he’d had to seal when he had taken the room. - One second he was climbing a ladder to put out an apartment fire and the next he was waking up to a ceiling he hadn’t seen in years. Somewhere out there, God is laughing at him, but he’s going to make the best of this unwanted second chance.

entry.title: i see trouble (and i want him to come my way)
entry.summary:
Author: neonweeknds

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 87,495Chapters: 11/24Kudos: 38

Summary: Buck was riding the high of his first successful solo debut, still nursing the ache of someone who walked away, when he got news that blindsided him—his upcoming solo tour wouldn’t be so solo after all. He’d be sharing the stage with Eddie Diaz, a rising country star with a mysterious past and a sound that was quickly blowing up. At first, Buck hated the idea. The last thing he wanted was to split the spotlight he’d fought so hard for. But then he actually got to know Eddie. The problem? Buck had always blurred the line between friendship and something more—and with Eddie, it was getting harder to tell the difference. or the pop star evan buckley and country singer eddie diaz slow burn angsty friends to lovers au.

entry.title: Unconditional Love
entry.summary:
Author: villayuly1987

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,857Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 19

Summary: Evan is Bobby’s biological son from a previous marriage; Athena is his stepmother)This story is set six months after a major virus exposure. Eddie has returned home from Texas to help out Chimney, who is temporarily stepping in as captain of the 118 firehouse while the actual captain, Bobby, is in a medically induced coma fighting the virus.During the six months apart, Eddie and Evan grew incredibly close, leading to a secret relationship between them. Evan is struggling significantly with his father's condition, spending almost all his time at the hospital, barely sleeping or eating. Eddie is actively trying to take care of him, even having to drag Evan out of the hospital to rest.

Author: mythmagicetc

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,172Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 191

Summary: “I just wanted to be…” not gentle, he’ll be annoyed if you say gentle, “…respectful, since he—you seemed so sad he asked you to move out.”Sad didn’t even begin to cover it. Maddie still remembered his little face on her doorstep, eyes red but carefully blank, promising he could help with the baby and the chores and whatever else. She had only managed to ask, “I thought you…Eddie?” but all he said was, “Maddie. Please,” and she let it go.Buck blinks. “Eddie didn’t ask me to move out. I left.”

entry.title: Let’s pretend it’s not the end of the world (the sky is falling down )
entry.summary:
Author: WhenFacingtheThingsWeTurnAwayFrom

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,161Chapters: 3/10Kudos: 17

Summary: Bobby has died and everyone is still dealing with the fallout. Buck is going to therapy and trying out a new exercise. Buck is still living with the Diaz's and is very happy to still have them around. Especially when they find out that their loved one isn't really dead.
